mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userID, name, nickname, email, gender, birthYear, phoneNumber) VALUES (#{userID}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birthYear}, #{phoneNumber})
INSERT INTO Address (userID, postcode, streetAddress, detailAddress) VALUES (#{userId}, #{postCode}, #{streetAddress}, #{detailAddress})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET nickname = #{nickname} WHERE userID = #{userID}
